title: Halp? Wont update.
body:
Alright so I defeated the first problem. Restored to an earlier update. Now im trying to patch. (I uninstalled, reinstalled) i can get past the lol loader but when it starts patching, a little ways in it says "unspecified error has occured, please check logs then retry." 

Anyone have any idea whats happenin'?

replies.body:
Update!!!!

Exciting. So a system restore,
Multiple reinstalls, multiple patch fails,
Cc cleaner(after re updating windows 10 updates CRITICAL) deleted any loose files from an old date effecting patch.
A few restarts.
Last restart reset the modem(CRITICAL). Boosted my internet back.
New client is updated.
Error! Reinstall league of legends. Went to folder deleted leagueclient.exe and ran launcher as administrator
Started patching.
59% and counting. Ill be on the rift in no time. 
I also did the things the support asked me to. Overall needed to be done.

15-20 hours of work computer and internet at 100% through tedious adjustments.

Ahhh rewarding.. Thank you rioterrr!

And i really dont think its a computer problem. Ive restored everything. But its also trying to update the game + client to the new one. Never have had this issue before. Im hardwired and its still dling really slow. Makes no sense to me. About as far as ive made it is 1-3%

Ayyy it's Benji again! Sorry to see ya back here so soon but let's work through this one as well.

Depending on just how far in the install you're getting will decide on how we need to tackle that unspecified error. Let me know if you're getting to 30% or if it's shooting that message before 30%.
